snippet.title: DISTRAINT: Deluxe Edition - Android & iOS Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
DISTRAINT is a 2D psychological horror adventure game for PC, Android, and iOS, originally released on Steam in 2015.

DISTRAINT: Deluxe Edition is coming to Android and iOS very soon!

You step into the shoes of an ambitious young man named Price.

In order to forge a partnership from a famous company, Price seizes the property of an elderly woman. 
In that very moment, he finds out the price of his humanity.

This is his story and the tale of his regrets...
___________________________________________________

DISTRAINT has been doing quite well thanks to the awesome community!
Deluxe Edition is my thanks to you. Take a look at what's new:

* Dynamic coloring - Goodbye gray, hello color!
* Increased environmental lighting
* Enhanced animation, graphics, and lighting effects
* Refined audio for better atmosphere
* Improved user interface

You can find me here:
https://twitter.com/jesse_makkonen
https://www.facebook.com/jessemakkonengames/
http://www.jessemakkonen.com/
